amendment.description: Amendment sought to reduce the appropriation for administrative expenses of the Export-Import Bank by $3.1 million.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 19 as printed in the Congressional Record to reduce the bill's $47.6 million appropriation for the Ex-Im Bank administrative expenses by $3.136 million.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Manzullo amendment (A003) Failed by recorded vote: 176 - 236 (Roll no. 211).
